text:
Alright it's workout walking up
You get your fun and your exercise

I think it's safe to say we're a lot better
on snow than on sand

Well it's been a fantastic day here
sandboarding and I've got to tell you

it's a little bit more difficult than snowboarding
but one heck of a lot of fun

and some beautiful scenery
and if you do come to Cape Town make sure

you come to Sand Boarding Cape Town and check
this out
